content:
Welcome to Webtoon Hangout! 
Once you have read all the rules, react with the :wave: on this message to gain access to the rest of the server!

embeds.title: Where do you go after verifying?
embeds.description:
> <#730531384732549121>
For the list of channels

> <#730531384732549120>
For some roles

> <#730531385449906236>
To introduce yourself

> <#738453870908276768> 
To meet some other members

footer.text: Have questions? DM an online staff member and we'll assist you!
